devdoc.author: Web3 Foundation

amend(address[],address[]).details: The given arrays must be same length and index must map directly.

params._amends: An array of the new addresses which can claim those allocations.

assignIndices(address[]).details: This function is safe because all the necessary checks are made on `assignNextIndex`.

params._eths: An array of all€ocation addresses to assign indices for.

claim(address,bytes32).details: Can only be called by the `_eth` address or the amended address for the allocation.

params._dot: The Polkadot public key to claim.
params._pubKey: The Polkadot public key to claim.

claimedLength().return: uint The number of accounts that have claimed.

params._eths: The addresses for which to set vesting.
The addresses for which to set vesting.
params._vestingAmts: The amounts that the accounts are vested.

devdoc.title: Claims         Allows allocations to be claimed to Polkadot public keys.

amend(address[],address[]).notice: Allows owner to manually amend allocations to a new address that can claim.

assignIndices(address[]).notice: Allows anyone to assign a batch of indices onto unassigned and unclaimed allocations.

claim(address,bytes32).notice: Claims an allocation associated with an `_eth` address to a `_pubKey` public key.

hasClaimed(address).notice: Get whether an allocation has been claimed.

setVesting(address[]).notice: Allows owner to manually toggle vesting onto allocations.

setVesting(address[],uint256[]).notice: Allows owner to manually toggle vesting onto allocations.
